publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7890 Michael Russell: The Fundable Bodies (University of the Highlands and Islands) Order 2011—That the Education, Lifelong Learning and Culture Committee recommends that the Fundable Bodies (University of the Highlands and Islands) Order 2011 be approved. Supported by: Angela Constance*

S3M-7890 Michael Russell: The Fundable Bodies (University of the Highlands and Islands) Order 2011—That the Education, Lifelong Learning and Culture Committee recommends that the Fundable Bodies (University of the Highlands and Islands) Order 2011 be approved. Supported by: Angela Constance
